nodes.text: Dendotaloga-K was a Gree research droid dispatched by the starship Gray Secant to study the planet Quesh. Accompanied by a squad of Gree battle droids, it observed the Quake, but the gases released into its atmosphere prevented it from transmitting data—and according to its calculations, the atmosphere would not be clear again for approximately ten thousand years by the time of the Galactic War.
